mapper.select: select product_no as productNo, store_no as storeNo, product_name as productName, product_content as productContent, product_price as productPrice, product_stock as productStock, product_date as productDate, product_img as productImg, product_sale as productSale, product_type as productType, product_count as productCount from product where store_no= #{_parameter} and product_type = 0

select product_no as productNo, store_no as storeNo, product_name as productName, product_content as productContent, product_price as productPrice, product_stock as productStock, product_date as productDate, product_img as productImg, product_sale as productSale, product_type as productType, product_count as productCount from product where store_no= #{_parameter} and product_type = 1

select productName, storeNo, productPrice, productImg, productCount from (select product_name as productName, store_no as storeNo, product_price as productPrice, product_img as productImg, product_count as productCount from product order by product_count desc) where rownum < 5

select product_no as productNo, store_no as storeNo, product_name as productName, product_content as productContent, product_price as productPrice, product_stock as productStock, product_date as productDate, product_img as productImg, product_sale as productSale, product_type as productType, product_count as productCount from product where product_no = #{_parameter}

select reviewNo, reviewComment, storeNo, reviewWriter, reviewContent, reviewView, reviewDate, rating, reviewImg from (select review_no as reviewNo, review_comment as reviewComment, store_no as storeNo, review_writer as reviewWriter, review_content as reviewContent, review_view as reviewView, review_date as reviewDate, rating, review_img as reviewImg from review order by review_view desc) where rownum < 11
mapper.delete: delete from product where product_date < sysdate and product_type = 0;
